Package io.adobe.cloudmanager

Interface CloudManagerApi

  • public interface CloudManagerApi
    API for interacting with Cloud Manager AdobeIO endpoints.

    Implementations of this interface must be context aware of the Adobe IMS Org when making API calls.

    Since:
    1.0

      • startExecution

        @NotNull
@NotNull PipelineExecution startExecution​(@NotNull
                                          @NotNull String programId,
                                          @NotNull
                                          @NotNull String pipelineId)
                                   throws CloudManagerApiException
        Starts the specified pipeline.

        Note: This API call may return before the requested action takes effect. i.e. The Pipelines are scheduled to start once called. However, an immediate subsequent call to getCurrentExecution(String, String) may not return a result.

        Parameters:
        programId - the program id context of the pipeline
        pipelineId - the id of the pipeline
        Returns:
        the new execution
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs
        See Also:
        Start Pipeline API

      • startExecution

        @NotNull
@NotNull PipelineExecution startExecution​(@NotNull
                                          @NotNull Pipeline pipeline)
                                   throws CloudManagerApiException
        Starts the specified pipeline.

        Note: This API call may return before the requested action takes effect. i.e. The Pipelines are scheduled to start once called. However, an immediate subsequent call to getCurrentExecution(String, String) may not return a result.

        Parameters:
        pipeline - the Pipeline to start
        Returns:
        the new execution
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs
        See Also:
        Start Pipeline API

      • isExecutionRunning

        boolean isExecutionRunning​(@NotNull
                           @NotNull PipelineExecution execution)
                    throws CloudManagerApiException
        Indicates if the specified pipeline execution is running. No assumptions are made about it's state - only that it has ended.
        Parameters:
        execution - the execution context to check
        Returns:
        true if the pipeline is running, false if has ended
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs

      • isExecutionRunning

        boolean isExecutionRunning​(@NotNull
                           @NotNull String programId,
                           @NotNull
                           @NotNull String pipelineId,
                           @NotNull
                           @NotNull String executionId)
                    throws CloudManagerApiException
        Indicates if the specified pipeline execution is running. No assumptions are made about it's state - only that it has ended.
        Parameters:
        programId - the program context for the pipeline execution
        pipelineId - the pipeline id for the execution
        executionId - the execution id
        Returns:
        true if the pipeline is running, false if has ended
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs

                             @NotNull String programId,
                             @NotNull
                             @NotNull String pipelineId)
                      throws CloudManagerApiException
        Advances the current execution of the specified pipeline. If no current execution exists, quietly does nothing.

        pipelineId - the id of the pipeline to cancel

        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs

      • downloadExecutionStepLog

        void downloadExecutionStepLog​(@NotNull
                              @NotNull String programId,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull String pipelineId,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull String executionId,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull String action,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull OutputStream outputStream)
                       throws CloudManagerApiException
        Streams the specified Execution Step log to the provided output stream. This will close the output stream when done.

        Uses the default log file name for the step.

        Parameters:
        programId - the program id of the pipeline context
        pipelineId - the pipeline id for the execution context
        executionId - the execution id for the logs
        action - the execution step action for the log
        outputStream - output stream to write to
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs
        See Also:
        Get Execution Logs API

      • downloadExecutionStepLog

                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull String name,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull OutputStream outputStream)
                       throws CloudManagerApiException

        void downloadExecutionStepLog​(@NotNull
                              @NotNull PipelineExecution execution,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull String action,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull String filename,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull OutputStream outputStream)
                       throws CloudManagerApiException
        Streams the specified Execution Step log to the provided output stream. This will close the output stream when done.
        Parameters:
        execution - the execution for the log
        action - the step action for the log
        filename - the log file name or null for the default
        outputStream - output stream to write to
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs.
        See Also:
        Get Execution Logs API

      • getQualityGateResults

                                                  @NotNull PipelineExecution execution,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  @NotNull String action)
                                           throws CloudManagerApiException
        Retrieves the metrics for the specified execution and step, if any.
        Parameters:
        execution - the execution step
        action - the action step for which quality metrics are desired
        Returns:
        the metrics for the execution
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs
        See Also:
        Get Step Metrics API

        @NotNull

                                                 @NotNull String programId,
                                                 @NotNull
                                                 @NotNull String environmentId,
                                                 @NotNull
                                                 @NotNull LogOption logOption,
                                                 int days,
                                                 @NotNull
                                                 @NotNull File dir)
                                          throws CloudManagerApiException
        Downloads the logs for the specified environment.
        Parameters:
        programId - the program id context for the environment
        environmentId - the environment id
        logOption - the log file reference
        days - how many days of log files to retrieve

        Returns:
        a list of EnvironmentLogs with details about the downloaded files
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs.

        Download Environment Logs API
